顤字的基本解释

顤
yáo
高长头。

顤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yáo］
［《廣韻》五聊切，平蕭，疑。］
［《廣韻》五弔切，去嘯，疑。］
［《廣韻》許交切，平肴，曉。］
头高长貌。

顤字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顤； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1409第23
【廣韻】許交切【集韻】虛交切，?音虓。【廣韻】䫜顤，人面也。【釋名】高也。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】䫜顤顟而睽睢。　又【廣韻】五聊切【集韻】倪幺切，?音堯。【玉篇】高長頭貌。　又【唐韻】【韻會】五弔切【集韻】倪弔切，?堯去聲。義同。　又【集韻】丘召切，音嘺。舉首也。

顤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
顤字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
顤
yáo
Tall and long head.
顤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yáo］
["Guangyun" five chats and cuts, Pingxiao, suspicious. ]
["Guang Yun" five hanging cuts, go to whistle, doubt. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Jiaoqie, Ping Yao, Xiao. ]
The head is tall and long.
顤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　顤; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1409 Page 23
[Guang Yun] Xu Jiaoqie [Ji Yun] False intersection,? Yin Yu. [Guang Yun] Lily, human face also. [Release name] Gao Ye. 【Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu】Let's lie and watch.　[Guangyun] Five Chats and Cuts [Jiyun] Ni Yaoqie,? Yin Yao. [Jade articles] Tall and long head.　[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Club] Five Diaoqie [Jiyun] Ni Diaoqie,? Yao goes. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Qiu Zhaoqie, sound 嘺. Raise your head too.
